mapper.select: select t2.* from (select @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS seq ,cm.coupon_master_seq couponMasterSeq ,cm.coupon_name couponName ,CONCAT(date_format(cm.open_date_start,'%Y-%m-%d %H'),'시') openDateStart ,CONCAT(date_format(date_add(cm.open_date_end,interval 1 second),'%Y-%m-%d %H'),'시') openDateEnd ,CONCAT(date_format(date_add(cm.ep_date,interval 1 second),'%Y-%m-%d %H'),'시') epDate ,cm.option_header optionHeader ,cm.option_detail optionDetail ,cm.img_name imgName ,cm.dc_option dcOption ,cm.dc ,cm.coupon_count couponCount from coupon_master cm ,(SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R ) t2 where t2.seq between #{start} and #{end} order by t2.seq asc;
select count(*) as count from coupon_master
